properties.description: Refer the  User Case description for Sub workflows

Import Workflow having prompt task (which all form elements in one wf)
Create a Playbook and Assignment rule and map above imported wf to a playbook 
Create Incident to trigger playbook for a created incident 
Execute the wf from incident 
Complete the prompt task and Verify the WF and Action status
Verify the Incident capture the workflow logs which should contains start, pause , resume and complete
Cleanup all objects which created in the automation.

Create Workflow having prompt task with Text as form Element
Create a Playbook and Assignment rule and map above created wf to a playbook 
Create Incident to trigger playbook for a created incident 
Execute the wf from incident 
Complete the prompt task and Verify the WF and Action status
Verify the Incident capture the workflow logs which should contains start, pause , resume and complete
Repeat the steps when checkbox unchecked and completed the prompt task
Cleanup all objects which created in the automation.

Create Workflow having prompt task with Check box form Element
Create a Playbook and Assignment rule and map above created wf to a playbook 
Create Incident to trigger playbook for a created incident 
Execute the wf from incident 
Complete the prompt task and Verify the WF and Action status
Verify the Incident capture the workflow logs which should contains start, pause , resume and complete
Repeat the steps when checkbox unchecked and completed the prompt task
Cleanup all objects which created in the automation.

      "reject",
      "pass",
      "fail",
      "inprogress",
      "waiting",
      "pause",
      "resume",
      "start",
      "stop",
      "completed",
      "incompleted"

}

properties.script:
import random
import string

def get_random_string(length):
    # choose from all lowercase letter
    letters = string.ascii_lowercase
    result_str = ''.join(random.choice(letters) for i in range(length))
    print(result_str)

get_random_string(8)

  "type": "Playbook Assignment Rule",
  $workflow.definition_workflow_02CHZSTLCFSZN3bYaQOfP2LjTbuZps6BYsb.input.variable_workflow_02CHZW8683OFY40aC7O1gvgSgTCYuTVQubp$

  "properties": {
    "group_by": true,
    "disabled": false,
    "rule_type": "rule_event",
    "title": "Rule-Title-$activity.definition_activity_02CHZU3VR2D1M3lrTkCqKTRfGkCr7O13OUF.output.response_body$",
    "description": "Rule-Description-$activity.definition_activity_02CHZU3VR2D1M3lrTkCqKTRfGkCr7O13OUF.output.response_body$",

}

properties.name: Enter the CleintID for Org where you Running
Enter the Cleint Secret for Org where you Running

properties.description:
Create Workflow having prompt task with Check box form Element
Create a Playbook and Assignment rule and map above created wf to a playbook 
Create Incident to trigger playbook for a created incident 
Execute the wf from incident 
Complete the prompt task and Verify the WF and Action status
Verify the Incident capture the workflow logs which should contains start, pause , resume and complete
Repeat the steps when checkbox unchecked and completed the prompt task
Cleanup all objects which created in the automation.
